formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The formula used is \( L = 4\pi R^2 \sigma T^4 \), where \( L \) is luminosity, \( R \) is radius, \( \sigma \) is the Stefan-Boltzmann constant, and \( T \) is temperature.
